name: BWorkgroupUserComponent
sample: <BWorkgroupUserComponent workgroupHintText='Your hint text' workgroupLabelText='Your label text' workgroupUserHintText='Your hint text' workgroupUserLabelText='Your label text' />

infoArray.name: selectedWorkgroupId
infoArray.desc: Determines the workgroup that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: selectedWorkgroupUserId
infoArray.desc: Determines the workgroup user that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: showSelfWorkgroup
infoArray.desc: Default value is false

infoArray.name: isDepartmentAndServiceTogether
infoArray.desc: Default value is false

infoArray.name: showSelfWorkgroupWithChildList
infoArray.desc: Default value is false

infoArray.name: showSubWorkgroupUsers
infoArray.desc: Default value is false

infoArray.name: workgroupTypeList
infoArray.desc: Filter the workgroups by workgroup types.

infoArray.name: workWithBranchComponent
infoArray.desc: Default value is false

infoArray.name: isAllOptionIncluded
infoArray.desc: If true an item will push to the first row of the parameter list. Default is value is false.

infoArray.name: allOptionDescription
infoArray.desc: If isAllOptionIncluded is true. Default value is 'Hepsi'

infoArray.name: workgroupHintText
infoArray.desc: The hint content to display.

infoArray.name: workgroupLabelText
infoArray.desc: The content of the floating label.

infoArray.name: workgroupUserHintText
infoArray.desc: The hint content to display.

infoArray.name: workgroupUserLabelText
infoArray.desc: The content of the floating label.

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: If true, the workgroup user component will be disabled. Default valuse is false

infoArray.name: workgroupDisabled
infoArray.desc: If true, the workgroup will be disabled. Default valuse is false

infoArray.name: workgroupUserDisabled
infoArray.desc: If true, the workgroup user will be disabled. Default valuse is false

infoArray.name: workgroupVisible
infoArray.desc: If true, the workgroup will be visible. Default valuse is true.

infoArray.name: workgroupUserVisible
infoArray.desc: If true, the workgroup user will be visible. Default valuse is true.

infoArray.name: getValue()
infoArray.desc: Returns the selected workgroup and user

infoArray.name: getValues()
infoArray.desc: Returns the list of workgroups

infoArray.name: onWorkgroupSelect
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the fec has been selected.

infoArray.name: onWorkgroupUserSelect
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the fec has been selected.
